actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-971.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing funds for the Committee on International Relations for expenses incurred in connection with visits to the United States by foreign heads of state and other foreign officials and for similar expenses incurred for meetings with senior United States Government officials and other dignitaries to discuss matters relevant to United States relations with other countries.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes the payment, not to exceed $55,000, of expenses incurred by the House Committee on International Relations in connection with visits to the United States by foreign heads of state, and for similar expenses incurred for meetings with senior Federal officials and other dignitaries to discuss foreign relations matters.

titles.title: A resolution providing funds for the Committee on International Relations for expenses incurred in connection with visits to the United States by foreign heads of state and other foreign officials and for similar expenses incurred for meetings with senior United States Government officials and other dignitaries to discuss matters relevant to United States relations with other countries.
